description: Verification Order required to confirm the numbering and description of the newly developed flats at fifth and sixth floor levels at 180 Brompton Road SW3 1HQ, following the reconfiguration of the fifth and sixth floor levels into 9 residential units, linked to Planning application PP/20/01060, as follows:Flat 501, Fifth Floor, 180 Brompton Road SW3 1HQFlat 502, Fifth Floor, 180 Brompton Road SW3 1HQFlat 503, Fifth Floor, 180 Brompton Road SW3 1HQFlat 504, Fifth Floor, 180 Brompton Road SW3 1HQFlat 505, Fifth Floor, 180 Brompton Road SW3 1HQFlat 601, Sixth Floor, 180 Brompton Road SW3 1HQFlat 602, Sixth Floor, 180 Brompton Road SW3 1HQFlat 603, Sixth Floor, 180 Brompton Road SW3 1HQFlat 604, Sixth Floor, 180 Brompton Road SW3 1HQ
